content: Jessica Hammer | Human-Computer Interaction Institute Skip to main content Search Expand Menu Close Menu Jessica Hammer Associate Professor Director, Center for Transformational Play Faculty Campus Address Rand Building, Suite 101 Links Website Google Scholar Research Areas AR / VR / XR Research through Design Games and Play Healthcare + HCI Learning Sciences and Educational Technologies Advisees Erica Cruz Noor Hammad Rotem Guttman Beatrice (Bea) Maggipinto Morgan Evans Administrative Staff Julia Chadwick Associate Professor Jessica Hammer is jointly appointed in the HCI Institute and the Entertainment Technology Center at Carnegie Mellon University. Her research focuses on transformational games, which are games that change how players think, feel, or behave. She is also an award-winning game designer.
